mapper.insert: insert into file_bas( thumb, file_cate_id, extension, file_type, ip_addr, thumb_file_id, file_id, file_name, file_path, content_type, creator, updater, available, display_index, download_num, size, createtime, updatetime ) values( #{thumb}, #{fileCateId}, #{extension}, #{fileType}, #{ipAddr}, #{thumbFileId}, #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{contentType}, #{creator}, #{updater}, #{available}, #{displayIndex}, #{downloadNum}, #{size}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime} )
